price: Biribiara a asuma wͻ ͻsoro ne asaase soͻ no nyinaa wͻ Nwoma pefee no mu.
arabic: وَمَا مِنۡ غَآئِبَةٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا فِي كِتَٰبٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā min ghāibatin fī al-samāi wal-arḍi illā fī kitābin mubīnin
